(I'm taking control of all of my characters except the Alliance ones, for now)


Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Ramhorn/Smokescreen/Chordate/Koga 
Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor/Bumblebee:



Double Punch, along with Manterror and Injector, all stood in Double Punch's 
regular sized quarters.

"I can't believe Hell Beast abandoned us to Megatron's pathetic leadership!" 
Injector yelled.

"Shut up!  I don't want to die." Manterror yelled.

"We have to get back to Cybertron and wreak havoc!  We never wanted to be 
part of this war anyways!"

"Got that right!" Injector yelled to Double Punch, the kind of leader of 
their group.  "That slagging Stinkbomb brought us here!"

"Yeah, I know.  Next time we see him, his skid plate is toast!  But we have 
to find a way of this dust ball." Double Punch said loudly.

"We'll just have to wait until the oppertunity presents itself, which isn't 
my slagging idea of fun!"

"Nor mine..." Double Punch mused, tryin to think of a scheme, but none that 
would get them off of Earth came to mind.

--------

Bumblebee entered the mess hall of the Predacon base, getting a glass of 
liquid energon.  Taking a seat, he began to drink quickly, washing down 
recent defeats with the tasty pink liquid.

=====

Ramhorn entered his quarters, laying down on the recharge bed, soon falling 
into a stasis-like sleep.

===

Smokescreen got out of the CR chamber he had been in, walking off towards the 
bridge of the Cybertronian Fire for orders.

---

Chordate approached the Cybertronian Fire, activating his com towards the 
bridge.  
<This is Chordate, lower the defenses, I'm coming in>

===

Koga Shuko paced around on the bridge of his craft.
"Set and his soldiers are dead or captured.  Probablyd ead, that incompitent 
fool.  We can't handle going on the offensive."

"I agree, Koga Shuko." Unitron said, nodding in agreement.

"Then what are we going to do?" Anubis asked.

"Yeah, I still want to fight!" Hades yelled.

"Personally, some R&R would be kind of nice." Serpentor chimed in.

"Prepare long range comm systems.  Set them to send a message to the Predacon 
forces.  We'll need to have them help us slightly." Shuko ordered.

A few moments later...

"It's done, Master Shuko." Unitron said, sitting at a console.

Shuko stepped to the console, Unitron stepping aside.  Sitting down, Shuko 
spoke into the microphone.

<Predacon base, I repeat, Predacon base, this is Koga Shuko.  Megatron, we 
had a peace treaty between my forces and the Predacons under Hell Beast's 
rule.  Do you wish the same for us?>
